{"id":973690280,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1687056044,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"22 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/973690280/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Value of the Partition","memory":"54.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findValueOfPartition(int[] nums) {\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        int ans=Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length-1;i++){\n            ans=Math.min(nums[i+1]-nums[i],ans);\n            \n            \n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-value-of-the-partition","has_notes":false}
